# Statistics

```{r hw-categories, echo=FALSE}
# Derive counts dynamically from included markdown (UHxxx entries)
hw_path <- "unit-operations/unitoperations_hw_en.md"
hw_lines <- readLines(hw_path, warn = FALSE, encoding = "UTF-8")
uh_count <- sum(grepl("^- \\*\\*UHW[0-9]{3}\\*\\*: ", hw_lines))

hw_categories <- data.frame(
  Category = c("Total Hardware Unit-operations"),
  Count = c(uh_count),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

kable(hw_categories, caption = "Hardware Unit Operation Statistics")
```
